title: March 2012 Tornado Road Closures - Indiana
name: March 2012 Tornado Road Closures - Indiana
description:
Data of Road Closures created March 2, 2012 from data provided by the American Red Cross and located using Google Earth.

These data are not official and are not guaranteed for accuracy.
